org.epochx.ge.codon
Class StandardGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.epochx.op.ConfigOperator<GEModel>
      org.epochx.ge.codon.StandardGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
CodonGenerator, ConfigListener, Listener, Operator
public class StandardGenerator
extends ConfigOperator<GEModel>
implements CodonGenerator

Generates codon values randomly between zero and the maximum codon size as specified by the model given as an argument to the constructor.

If a model is provided then the following parameters are loaded upon every configure event:

  • random number generator
  • maximum codon size

If the getModel method returns null then no model is set and whatever static parameters have been set as parameters to the constructor or using the standard accessor methods will be used. If any compulsory parameters remain unset when a new codon is requested, then an IllegalStateException will be thrown.
